main: ^Fang: Look out there. a whole playground. And it all bows to me
^I havent heard a single person even mention you?
^What do you know about lilac butterfly?
npc: ^Fang: theyre too scared to. Thats why
info: ^Fang: her. She thought she could free the ballpit from my artefact but she failed
info2: ^Fang: my artefact. My greatest creation. Only those who appease me can enter

c-0: ^Fang: youre just a boring non believer
